live_updates: Services have been stabilized and the issue is now resolved. We thank you for your patience during the interruption.
Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
52681.summary: Some customers in the Kildonan Crossing area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
52681.title: Aug 20 - Winnipeg (Kildonan Crossing) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
